channel.title: [317/614] Rush Ville || SOF || Credit System || Ckeys || Dicing || 24/7 VPS Host
channel.description:
Rush Ville [b]Where Your Adventure Begins... [/b]
We are a Runescape Private Server that had a lot of time spent on and a lot of attention to detail to tweak a perfect, smooth and amazing economy.
We have a Credits currency. There are 2 shops with the gear everybody wants, for Credits. To gather your Credits you need to level-up, PK, skill, do Slayer tasks, complete mini-games and more!
NEW: You can now buy 250 credits for 50m GP to the NPC next to the Credit shop! [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/1zlr8ma.jpg[/img]
If you guys are into PKing, then all the basic welfare PKing gear is FREE. But if you're feeling tough, then you can risk some Credit items in the wilderness!
We have also made ALL monsters drop Crystal Keys, these keys are used to open a chest at Edgeville so you can get a RANDOM CREDIT ITEM, and if you're lucky.. DRAGON CLAWS.
All skills work 100% All prayers work 100% All specials work 100% All mini-games work 98%
So? What are you waiting for, start your adventure today!
LINKS
Website link: [url=http://www.rushville317.com]Rush Ville - Index[/url] [b](Webclient Available) [/b]
Instant Download link: http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/50ped86kg8ot085/rushville.jar?dl=1
We Hope To See You There! :p
Annotated Screenshots Below!
[u][b]Credit Shops[/b][/u] [img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/1445s86.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2zppmk2.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Avatar Of Destruction[/b][/u] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/28vvfw1.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Bosses[/b][/u] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/21dl6dv.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi59.tinypic.com/kdodft.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/33wy4uu.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi59.tinypic.com/5bd73s.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Custom Skilling Zone[/b][/u] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2a01bo4.jpg[/img]
[u][b]FunPK Area[/b][/u] [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/28882ab.jpg[/img]
[U][B]NPC Kills[/B][/U] [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2nby83r.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Special Attacks[/b][/u] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/opppj8_th.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/fc5mdc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2wn435u_th.png[/img]

item.title: [317/614] Rush Ville || SOF || Credit System || Ckeys || Dicing || 24/7 VPS Host
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Great server to play with a small community.
The credit system makes you do pvp as well pvm and or skilling.

Although i enjoy it, it doesn’t show much unique feature or hard to do programming.
Hopefully there will be updates soon, which will make more players to join.

Read full topic
item.source: [317/614] Rush Ville || SOF || Credit System || Ckeys || Dicing || 24/7 VPS Host
